item.title: Backing Things Up
item.description: /u/bigheadsmith just asked on Reddit about good solutions for local and remote backups for home PCs – so I offered an outline of my current backup regime. Only a couple of responses so far, but suggestions seem to converge around rclone and restic being good solutions on Linux. Restic also received a lot of enthusiastic support on a recent-ish Hacker News post, with some users saying they’d switched to restic from borg.
